H0.text: What country is the world's largest producer of Tobacco. India

H1.text: What country is the world's largest producer of Tobacco. United States

H2.text: What country is the world's largest producer of Tobacco. Brazil

H3.text: What country is the world's largest producer of Tobacco. 中国

A4.text: China's share of the world market increased from 17% in 1971 to 47% in 1997.

A5.text: Top producers are China (36.3%), India (12.9%), Brazil (11.9%) and Zimbabwe (3.5%).
